title: Milan Fashion Week: the best street style looks, from breezy dresses to modern tailoring
text:
Milan Fashion Week kicked off earlier this week with a host of international fashion editors packing their best outfits (Milan is often the most glamorous of them all) to head to Italy.

As they take in the spring/summer 2020 collections from the likes of Max Mara, Fendi and Bottega Veneta, we've had our eye on how they've approached dressing for the transeasonal weather, and have come away with some great style tips.

Here, Tamu McPherson offers inspiration for a sleek, modern way to colour clash, teaming her oversized fuchsia blazer with Bottega Veneta's cyan padded mules.

Click through the gallery to see what everyone else was wearing...
